name: restful-api
description: | HTTP Method | Endpoint | CRUD Operation | Route Name | Description | |--|--|--|--|--| | Get | /songs | Read | Index | Get all the songs | | Get | /songs/:songid | Read | show | Dislay data for a single song | | Get | /songs/:songid/edit | Read | edit | display on edit form | | Put | /songs/:songid | update a current song | edit | update a specific song | | Post | /songs | Create a new song| create | Add a new song to the list | | Delete | /songs:songid | delete a specific operation| delete | Add a new song to the list |
